byline.contributor: Myra Noveck, Irit Pazner Garshowitz and Gabby Sobelman contributed research.

abstract: Israel state comptroller report criticizes spending habits of Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and his wife Sara; says details of extravagant expenses raises 'suspicion of a criminal act.'
lead_paragraph: A report by the state comptroller detailed expenses for the prime minister and his wife, Sara, that he said raised “suspicion of a criminal act.”

headline.main: Inquiry by Israeli Comptroller Criticizes Spending Habits of Netanyahu and Wife
headline.print_headline: Inquiry by Israeli Comptroller Criticizes Spending Habits of Netanyahu and Wife

snippet: A report by the state comptroller detailed expenses for the prime minister and his wife, Sara, that he said raised “suspicion of a criminal act.”
